title: EUROPE RESEARCH ROUNDUP-Burberry, Entain , Legrand
text:
â€© Sept 22 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Burberry, Entain and Legrand, on Wednesday.

HIGHLIGHTS

* AO World Plc : Davy Research starts with neutral rating

* Burberry : Barclays starts with equal weight rating; price target 2000p

* Compagnie Financiere Richemont SA : Barclays starts with overweight rating

* Entain : Peel Hunt cuts to hold from buy

* Legrand : Exane BNP Paribas raises to outperform from neutral

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Wednesday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.

* Adecco Group AG : Deutsche Bank cuts price target to CHF 68.80 from CHF 71.3

* Airtel Africa : Barclays raises price target to 165p from 135p

* Alphawave IP Group Plc : Barclays raises price target to 500p from 475p

* Alphawave IP Group Plc : BMO raises target price to 500p from 425p

* Alstom : BofA Global Research cuts price objective to EUR 25 from EUR 30

* Anglo American : BofA Global Research cuts price objective to 3300p from 4600p

* Anglo American : Jefferies cuts price target to 3100p from 4000p

* Antofagasta : Jefferies cuts price target to 1900p from 2000p

* AO World Plc : Davy Research starts with neutral rating

* ASA International Group Plc : Citigroup cuts price target to 170p from 175p

* Ashtead Group Plc : Morgan Stanley raises price target to 5870p from 5420p

* ASML Holding NV : Goldman Sachs raises target price to EUR 845 from EUR 685

* Aspo PLC : Inderes raises to buy from accumulate; target price EUR 12.50

* Bawag Group AG : Morgan Stanley raises price target to EUR 64 from EUR 58

* BHP : BofA Global Research cuts to neutral from buy

* BHP : Jefferies cuts price target to 2300p from 2550p

* Boohoo : Davy Research starts with outperform rating; price target 399p

* Burberry : Barclays starts with equal weight rating; price target 2000p

* Burberry : SocGen cuts price target to 2270p from 2282p

* Burberry : SocGen raises to buy from hold

* Compagnie Financiere Richemont SA : Barclays starts with overweight rating

* Compagnie Financiere Richemont SA : Barclays starts with price target CHF 123

* Deutsche Beteiligungs AG : Jefferies raises price target to EUR 47 from EUR 44

* Deutsche Post AG : Morgan Stanley resumes coverage with price target of EUR 73
